name: Light's path
description:
Light's Path is a take on a Puzzle Platformer by someone (me) who hasn't done either of those ever. So expect the unexpected, I think.

I managed to make the browser version work. It's the exact same game: https://itch.io/game/edit/1419499#publishe

Your mission is to steal the gold chests and get out of there. Shooting will be penalized when your superiors give you a rating after you finish a heist.

The enemies are equipped with flashlights and if you come to close to them or get spotted by the other lights they'll start a search action. Getting spotted during the search action will prove fatal to your cause.

Each mission will bring new challenges, expect everything you've learned to not be true in your next mission. There is a reason after all that no-one believes they're real.

Don't get spotted, don't get killed, preserve ammo, be as fast as you can and make sure to bring the gold home!

Report your rating card of a heist you're proud of, to the observes lurking in the shadow of the comment section.

I've done everything my self - code, art, design and music. The sound effect are the only thing I haven't done :)

All the levels can be completed without firing a single shot - of course if you're up to the challenge.

I'll be playing game jam games on stream and you can check me out on other socials if you like the game, I appreciate you all a lot! :)
